vocabulary.english: to look for something for someone (BF)

contents.markdown: They are used to perform an action for the benefit of someone.
Notice that the nuance of “for” is built into BF verbs, so there is no need to use _para_. Also, there is no annotation after BF because it is its own, unique variant/nuance.
These are BF verbs, so as a reminder:
For BF verbs, X is the focus, and it is called the “benefactor”.

item.tagalog: Ihanap mo ng aso si Maria.
Iginawa sila ni Jason ng lechon.
Ikukuha ng guro ng mangga ang mga estudyante.
item.english: The teacher will get mangoes for the students.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Sino ang inihahanap ni Maria ng pusa araw-araw?
exampleSentences.english: Who does Maria look for a cat for every day?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Kailan igagawa ni Sir Santos ng mga tanong ang mga estudyante?
exampleSentences.english: When will Mr. Santos make questions for the students?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ikinuha kita non nung ibinigay mo sa akin ang ilaw.
exampleSentences.english: I got that for you when you gave me the light.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Taga-Parañaque ang ibibili natin nito ngayon.
exampleSentences.english: The one we (incl.) will buy this for today is from Parañaque.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ikopya mo ng mga pangalan ng tindahan si Sir Bautista.
exampleSentences.english: Copy some store names for Mr. Bautista.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Inihanap po namin kayo ng manok nang apat na araw.
exampleSentences.english: We (excl.) searched for a chicken for you for four days. (resp.)

exampleSentences.tagalog: Iginawa siya ni David ng tsokolateng inilagay sa kuwarto niya.
exampleSentences.english: David made her a chocolate that was put in her room.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ikinukuha ni Diego ng Ingles na pangalan si Joe. Hindi ito mahirap.
exampleSentences.english: Diego is getting an English name for Joe. It is not hard.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ibili mo siya ng gusali, hindi lang CR!
exampleSentences.english: Buy her a building, not just a restroom!

exampleSentences.tagalog: Ikinopya namin ng mga tanong ang babaeng isinama mo, di ba?
exampleSentences.english: We (excl.) copied questions for the woman you took along, didn't we?
